naslov: Charming Historic House in the Heart of Šibenik (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Charming Historic House in the Heart of Šibenik Discover the perfect blend of history and modern comfort in this beautifully restored house, ideally situated in the heart of Šibenik’s enchanting old town. Originally built in 1825, this stunning property has undergone a complete renovation in 2011, transforming it into a stylish residence while preserving its charming historical features. Spanning an impressive 150 m², the house comprises two well-appointed apartments, making it an excellent investment opportunity for those seeking rental income or a spacious family home. The apartments boast contemporary finishes, open layouts, and abundant natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Step outside and immerse yourself in the rich culture and vibrant life of Šibenik, with its narrow cobblestone streets, quaint cafes, and historic landmarks just a stone’s throw away. The property is not only a sanctuary of comfort but also a gateway to explore the stunning Dalmatian coast. Offered at €450,000, this exceptional property combines historical charm with modern amenities, making it a rare find in one of Croatia’s most picturesque towns. Don’t miss your chance to own a piece of Šibenik’s history!
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
